document.full_text: rafa nadal will have to be at his best to get through a tough draw and cope with the faster conditions if he is to win a second straight madrid masters title this week, the world number one said on sunday.
document.title: nadal says facing tough draw, fast conditions in madrid
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal will have to be at his best to get through a tough draw and cope with the faster conditions if he is to win a second straight madrid masters title this week, the world number one said on sunday.
